page.title: 17RECREATION:ASHLEWORTH
page.content: Lots of people walk around the lanes and fields of Ashleworth and Hasfield. Horse-riding is another thing that people like to do around the lanes and bridle-paths.Cycling is also popular. Football and cricket are played on the {Village Green }and there is a cricket and football area which also has it's own club and playground with swings, climbing frame and see-saw.Golf and jogging are also popular.At the Ham people go to see wild ducks,geese and other birds.{Fishing}and{Boating}take} place on the River Severn.There is a Badminton Club at the hall and some people play tennis.There are 2 Public Houses where you can go for a drink and play snooker,darts and cards.Bingo is played in the village hall.Some people enjoy painting the interesting views in Ashleworth and Hasfield.
